metadata.title: DPM, Acting Afghan FM agree to remain engaged to achieve full regional economic development potential

content.article_body: KABUL, Jul 17 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister/ Foreign Minister (DPM/FM), Senator Mohammad Ishaq Dar on Thursday met with Acting Afghan Foreign Minister Amir Khan Muttaqi, where both leaders agreed to remain engaged to achieve full potential of regional economic development, including through realization of trans-regional connectivity projects. The two sides called for strengthened efforts to maintain the momentum in bilateral relations and to expand cooperation in trade, transit and security domains to the mutual benefit of both peoples, a DPM's Office news release said.
